entry.tran: 与经验有关的;由经验得来的
entry.def: Experiential means relating to or resulting from experience.

example.ex: Learning has got to be active and experiential.
example.tran: 学习必须积极，而且要汲取经验。

example.ex: ...the rediscovery of the experiential path of religious truth.

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or resulting from experience;
2. derived from experience or the experience of existence;
